channel.title: No Batch
channel.description:
I think it's time there has been enough useless batch threads in the section, especially when there is sites to use such as: [ul][li][url=http://www.ss64.com/nt/]Windows XP Commands - SS64.com[/url][/li] [li][url=http://technet2.microsoft.com/windowsserver/en/library/552ed70a-208d-48c4-8da8-2e27b530eac71033.mspx?mfr=true]Command line reference - Microsoft.com[/url][/li][/ul]
Please, stop posting Batch topics as all that is needed is a look on either of the above sites. If Batch topics are posted, they will become locked.
